title: Lloyds of London
creator_credit: Central Office of Information and World Wide
brief_description: In a television interview lloyd’s chairman, Sir Matthew Drysdale answers various questions concerning the historical origins, development and present day functions of Lloyds of London. The interviewer is Robert McKenzie and to illustrate the discussion, scenes of activities, past and present, are included.
